mapper.select: SELECT RES.ID_ AS id, RES.PROC_INST_ID_ AS procInstId, RES.BUSINESS_KEY_ AS businessKey, RES.SUSPENSION_STATE_ AS suspensionState, RES.TENANT_ID_ AS tenantId, RES.START_ACT_ID_ AS startActId, RES.START_TIME_ AS startTime, RES.START_USER_ID_ AS startUserId, P.KEY_ AS `procDefKey`, P.ID_ AS procDefId, P.NAME_ AS `procDefName`, P.VERSION_ AS version, P.DEPLOYMENT_ID_ AS deploymentId, `user`.DISPLAY_NAME_ AS startUserName, `user`.EMAIL_ AS email FROM act_ru_execution AS RES INNER JOIN act_re_procdef AS P ON RES.PROC_DEF_ID_ = P.ID_ INNER JOIN act_id_user AS `user` ON RES.START_USER_ID_ = `user`.ID_ WHERE RES.PARENT_ID_ IS NULL ORDER BY RES.ID_ ASC
